title: 3.1 Master Challenge 1
question:
Open any child-friendly search engine on your device.
Which browser did you use? _________________________
What is the name of the search engine you opened? _________________________

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
